lead_paragraph: China's sports establishment must learn the lessons from a corruption scandal involving a former deputy sports minister, continue to root out graft, and curb a win-at-all costs mentality, the country's top graft-buster said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: China Warns Again on Sports Corruption, Lust for Gold
headline.main: China Warns Again on Sports Corruption, Lust for Gold

snippet: China's sports establishment must learn the lessons from a corruption scandal involving a former deputy sports minister, continue to root out graft, and curb a win-at-all costs mentality, the country's top graft-buster said on Friday....
